home.title: Home
home.subtitle: Timeless harmony of art and technology.

sections.message:
I believe in a new language.
A language where a line of code can be as elegant as a line of choreography.
Where a business model can be a work of art.
And where an artist can be the architect of their own future.

messageSplit.leftText: The old model casts you as a performer, waiting for permission, subject to a broken system.
messageSplit.rightText: The new model empowers you as an architect: a sovereign creator who designs their own systems, builds their own value, and owns their own career.
